

1)192.168.1.4


11000000.10101000.00000 001.00000100 --->Ip address
11111111.11111111.11111 000.00000000 --->Subnet mask

11000000.10101000.00000 000.00000000 --->Network Address
11000000.10101000.00000 111.11111111 --->BroadCast Address

Available no of Ip address= 2^11 -2 = 2048 - 2 = 2046

range

192.168.0.1 - 192.168.0.254

192.168.7.1 - 192.168.7.254
